word_mean: 断奶：给婴儿停止喂奶，代之以其他食物喂养

sentence.Network_en: It can be extremely difficult to wean children off junk food.
sentence.Network_cn: 让儿童改掉吃零食的习惯有时十分困难.

sentence.Network_en: The hospital managed to wean her off the drug.
sentence.Network_cn: 医院已让她逐步减少依赖这种药.

sentence.Network_en: The patch enables smokers to wean themselves off cigarettes very gradually.
sentence.Network_cn: 这张贴片能使吸烟者很缓慢地把烟戒掉.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wenian, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch wennen and German entwöhnen
late 17th cent.: contraction of wee ane 'little one'

entry.def: When a baby or baby animal is weaned, its mother stops feeding it milk and starts giving it other food, especially solid food.

example.ex: The baby would be weaned and she would bring it home...
example.tran: 婴儿断奶后，她会把婴儿带回家。

example.ex: When would be the best time to start weaning my baby?...
example.tran: 什么时候开始给我的孩子断奶最好？

entry.tran: 使放弃，使戒掉，使不再依赖(尤指恶习)
entry.def: If you wean someone off a habit or something they like, you gradually make them stop doing it or liking it, especially when you think is bad for them.

example.ex: He was mellowed by a wife who weaned him off violence and drink...
example.tran: 他妻子帮他戒除了动粗和嗜酒的恶习，使他变得成熟了。

example.ex: You are given pills with small quantities of nicotine to wean you from cigarettes...
example.tran: 会给你一些含少量尼古丁的药片帮你戒除烟瘾。

sentences.sentence: "she weaned her baby when he was 3 months old and started him on powdered milk"

auth_sentence.content: Please take a vacation and wean yourself off it!

auth_sentence.content: Hopefully this experiment can wean me off that guilty habit.

auth_sentence.content: Renewable energy and conservation are the other corenerstones to wean us off hydrocarbon fuels.

sentences.en: Traditionally piglets were weaned at eight weeks.
sentences.cn: 小猪通常在八周时断奶。

sentences.en: I was weaned on a regular diet of Hollywood fantasy.
sentences.cn: 我从小就时常看好莱坞幻想片。

means.word_mean: (使)逐渐戒除恶习(或避免依赖…)
